caption: A woman was busy packing her belongings, seemingly preparing to board a carriage. A man approached her, attempting to strike up a conversation. While engaged in dialogue, the woman gradually got onto the carriage and eventually departed. It appeared that she shared some information with the man before leaving.In a grand hall, a young girl knelt on the floor, and a teenage king was in the midst of punishing her. He forcibly removed her clothes. Just then, another person entered, berating the king's actions and tending to the girl. The king displayed intense anger but appeared helpless in the situation.Meanwhile, in another room, a man and a woman were engrossed in conversation.
